settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: Michaela Crouse
settings.content:
Boho Bouquet

Vibrant colors, natural elements, and just a touch of skin.

settings.title: Sarah Miller
settings.content:
Bunny Bliss with Spring  

The perfect mix of farmhouse, spring, and Sola Wood.

settings.title: Jillybeez
settings.content:
A Piece for the Farm

Berries, books, and barnhouse red. Matches made in heaven.

settings.title: Alely Ponce
settings.content:
Classic Wedding Bouquet

Perfectly paired peach with red accent, a Raw Sola backdrop, and splashes of green and brown to center.

settings.title: Lenae Crowe
settings.content:
Muted Purple Perfection

Dilapidated purples, antique whites, and a display of green to match. A perfect wall-piece.

settings.title: Catie Menne
settings.content:
Paired with Prints

Flower adorned prints, a neutral backdrop, and colorful hoops. A simple setting, and a gorgeous result.
